name: 雙語教育之課室英語（教）
description: This course focuses on language use in the bilingual classroom. The class focuses on language use of both the bilingual teacher and the bilingual learner. Students will gain experience in using language to present academic content and learn techniques for facilitating student language learning through content. Students will also be expected to conduct student observations in a bilingual classroom with a focus on language use.
goals: 透過本課程的介紹，使學生認識哲學的基本概念及各種教育思想的特點。
syllabus:
**Course Outcomes**

By the end of this course, students will be able to

1.  identify various genres within a content discipline
2.  analyze disciplinary texts for features at the lexical, clausal, and discourse levels
3.  demonstrate genre-based pedagogies within a content lesson
